name: @tupaia/api-client
description: API client for connecting to Tupaia APIs

scripts.prepublish:strict: yarn lint && yarn build:typedefs && yarn build
scripts.prepublish:loose: yarn lint; yarn build:typedefs; yarn build
scripts.prepublish:
printf "

NOTE: Running loose mode, change to strict when issues fixed

"; yarn prepublish:loose

author: Beyond Essential Systems <admin@tupaia.org> (https://beyondessential.com.au)
